MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML7 postcode area of Shotts, affecting properties in Salsburgh and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.30pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site in the local area and have confirmed the power cut has been caused by an underground cable fault outside 123 Main Street. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.07pm on Wednesday 17th March 2021
